ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: will eat from the tree of Zaqqum,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Will eat of the tree of Zaqqum,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: shall all eat from the Tree of al-Zaqqum,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: will eat from the fruit of the tree of Zaqqum,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: You will indeed eat from the Zaqqum tree.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You verily, will eat of the trees of Zaqqum."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely eat of a tree of Zaqqoom,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: you shall eat of a tree called Zakkoum,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Ye verily will eat of a tree called Zaqqum
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: shall eat the fruit of the tree of Zaqqum,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Shall surely eat of the tree of Az-Zqqum.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: will surely eat from the Zaqqum tree
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Ye will surely taste of the Tree of Zaqqum.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You verily will eat of the trees of Zaqqum.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: you shall eat (the fruit) of the Tree of Zakkum.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Will be eating from the Tree of Bitterness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:52] will assuredly eat from a Zaqqūm tree (min zaqqūm, the explication of shajar, ‘tree’),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Ye verily will eat of a tree called Zaqqum 643
